biotools.summary: A digital atlas of mouse embryonic development consisting of a database of the anatomical structures that are found at different stages of mouse embryo development, and a set of 3D volumetric digital embryo models at different stages of mouse development. It creates interactive three-dimensional computer models of mouse embryos at successive stages of development with defined anatomical domains linked to a stage-by-stage ontology of anatomical names.

bioschemas.name: Edinburgh Mouse Atlas EMAP
